reviewText: Though a tad more revealing in some ways, it had much of the usual not too great stuff that you see on these videos. I fast forwarded through much of it.

This video has some very nice lookin women. There are more playmates in this one than Girlfriends which had mostly playboy models. There is not as much physical contact between the girls in this video compared to the Girlfriend video.
As previously mentioned, the bonus feature Playmate Profiles is an extra 25 mintutes of video of playmates Kristi Cline and Jennifer Rovero. Porn star Teanna Kai is pictured in the cover but not listed in the box credits. She does appear in one scene with another girl and a guy. Her name does appear in the credits at the end of the video.
This DVD is great!!!10,000,000 stars!!!!!!DA BOMB!!!!!!

Except for the fact it is about a year old; this is one the best things Playboy has got going. Groups of beautiful women doing things we only wish we could see in person, God's perfect woman in Shannon Stewart and Tequila Shots from certain navels makes this a worthwhile purchase. More please!...
